front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Media Access Control (MAC) Service Definition

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The MAC Service and the Internal Sublayer Service (ISS) are defined in this standard. This standard specifies media-dependent convergence functions that map IEEE 802(R) MAC interfaces to the ISS. The MAC Service is derived from the ISS. (The PDF of this standard is available at no charge compliments of the IEEE GET Program https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page)
